short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds all duplicate HTML IDs on the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simplifies the detection of duplicate HTML IDs on webpages, making it easier for web developers to identify and resolve issues related to CSS and HTML.
